channel.title: Crezion 751 -/- XP Modes - IronMan - Pest Invasion - ClueScrolls -\-
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://gyazo.com/1a6cae88049d8f1c217e5255f1f17585.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://crezion.com/Crezion.jar"]Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://crezion.com"]Crezion's Website[/URL] Crezion is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion's Development Team for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available. Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Crezion has already lots of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more.
[B]Starter[/B] As soon as our tutorial started, you will have the opportunity to play as a Regular or Iron Man players.
[B][U]Regular Player[/U][/B] & [B][U]Iron Man[/U][/B]
[B]XP Modes[/B] After you have selected your starter type, you will have the opportunity the game mode, that you'd like to play on! They modes have different experience rate!
[U][B]Squire[/B] Game Mode[/U] [U][B]Knight[/B] Game Mode[/U] [U][B]Legend[/B] Game Mode[/U]
[B]Crezion's Features[/B] VPS Hosted 24/7 Queen Black Draggon Special Attacks & Effects Corporeal Beast Drygores including off-hands Dueling Anywhere LodeStone Activation Master Capes Wildstalker Helmets Private Messaging Toolbelt Slayer System Clan chat System ClueScrolls Dragonfire Shield Summoning Scroll & Pouch creation All Spelbooks & PrayerLists Friends Chat Channel Dungeoneering Multi Barrage & AutoCasting Perfect Economy Xp Counter Staff of Light

Download
Crezion’s Website
Crezion is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion’s Development Team for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available. Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Crezion has already lots of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more.

Starter
As soon as our tutorial started,
you will have the opportunity to play as a Regular or Iron Man players.

Regular Player & Iron Man

XP Modes
After you have selected your starter type, you will have
the opportunity the game mode, that you’d like to play on!
They modes have different experience rate!

Squire Game Mode Knight Game Mode Legend Game Mode

Crezion’s Features
VPS Hosted 24/7
Queen Black Draggon
Special Attacks & Effects

Drygores including off-hands
